places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Chatkara

reviews.text: Hotel  offers a delightful and memorable hospitality experience. From the moment you step into the elegantly designed lobby, you are greeted with warmth and efficiency by the attentive staff. The hotel's attention to detail is evident in every aspect, from the stylish decor to the well-appointed rooms that provide a comfortable and luxurious retreat.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Ashoka Grand
address: Patel Babu Road, Bhikhanpur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812002, India

reviews.text: I had a great experience. I arrived at the hotel the day after my booking day due to train delay. I requested them to give me room for 1-2 hours to just freshen up. They had no need to help me at all as my arrival was after the checkout time of my booked day. But, the receptionist and the management was so kind that they accepted my request, and were sweeter to keep my bags when I was out for work.

The room was really clean and very spacious. The WiFi was good and the staff very friendly. Hot water was working in the bathroom and you also have a kettle. I didn't go to the breakfast. The bad point is that it was really noisy, the road was always crowded. And it is really expensive for India, I stayed in places as good as this one for 3 times less this price.

I booked this hotel for ring ceremony and the services they provided were pathetic.. They promised a lot and did nothing.. First of all there were scarcity of hotel staff. They served cold food to the people. There were not enough staff to handle the gathering of 100 people.. And the taste of the food was below poor.. Please anyone don't book this hotel for any purpose they will just loot your hard earned money and you will regret later... Take this as a warning.

Very Poor Service
3rd Class Dharmsala
This is not a hotel, this is old type of dharmsala. Food quality is very poor. Sometimes they served food from outside. Milk tea is not available in the kitchen.
Staff behaviour is totally unprofessional. They just hired normal guys with high attitude. Hotel management is also having this type of unprofessional behaviour.
Nice hotel with quite good rooms. Food available at a reasonable price. Service is a bit late but the staffs are quite friendly.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Vaibhav
address: Kachari Chowk, MG Rd, near Indian Oil Petrol Pump, Bhikhanpur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812001, India

reviews.text:
have not stayed in the room so not sure how the rooms are but have visited their restaurant many times and can say it's quite good. Food taste is good, service is also prompt and fast.
I think Vaibhav has one of the biggest dining hall in the city. so you almost never need any reservation before visiting the restaurant.
Price is on higher side. meal for 4 usually costs around 3K per visit, but As taste, ambiance and service is good, it justifies.
A few bad experiences with the restaurant are occasional bad taste and once I got chicken slices in my veg pasta, that too when Navratre was being celebrated. most of the non veg eater don't eat non veg this period and I am pure vegetarian.
Shocked? even I was.  But it had happen with me many times in different restaurants around the world.So I didn't cared much about. But I felt bad when they even charged me for the pasta.
At least as a gesture of sorry they shouldn't charge for it.
rest every is good with the restaurant and despite a few more minor bad experiences with the restaurant. I and my family usually prefer to be there for outings.

The service at the hotel restaurant was terrible, and the person at the reception was incredibly rude. It felt like they didn't care about the time or our experience at all. Yar hotel khola hai ya chutiyo ka foj ekattha kiya hai.

Hotel Vaibhav is a great choice for travellers looking for a 3 star star hotel in Bhagalpur. This Hotel stands out as one of the highly recommended hotel in Bhagalpur. Hotel is rated 3.4 out of 5, which is considered as very good.

The room was unhygienic, full of mosquitos, so could not sleep in night. The noisy AC was another reason of disturbance. Rooms are very old. The staff behavior is kind of unprofessional and immature type. Receptionist tried to be over-smart. Over all does not meet expectation.
Located at heart of Bhagalpur. Delicious food is served. Enjoy roof top dinner with beautiful scenery.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Max Inn
address: R.N Tower, Sahay Road, RBSS Rd, Bhikhanpur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812001, India

reviews.text: The hotel is decent at the price and service is good. It's in a calm neighborhood so good for a peaceful stay for business trips. It's close to the airport and railway junction. The food is also quite good in terms of quality and quantity. Liked it!!

The hotel property is good.
But in providing service point of view not so well.
They try to manipulate you in their own words.
So think twice before choosing this hotel.
Really disappointing experience I have.

The rooms are good but lacking the cleaness.The Service is very poor.The reception is not prompt.They usually takes a full day to resolve a simple issue.Never try to pick the call.Food quality is good.

Despite my prior & confirm booking they kept me waiting till 10:00 pm for a room. Because they were busy to provide room to some of their favourite people.
No TV, No Phone nothing was working.
The mattress and blanket were totally dirty.

I visited this hotel .
The quality of the food was the worst.
I visited with my family on 25th October at 10 pm and the next morning each of us were suffering from food poisoning.
The price was too high to fit the quality of the food. Street food is better than this hotel. If you want to stay healthy, then stay away from this hotel.
The hotel should be inspected by authorities. Who's gonna pay for the treatment of my family?
Please work on this.

places_with_reviews.name: Chinmaye Inn
address: 7X4W+H5J, Rai Bahadur Sukhraj Rai Rd, Katahalbari, Khanjarpur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812001, India

reviews.text:
Hi, I have stayed in this hotel and took banquets for corporate event. As per me if you are planning to stay in this hotel please keep yourself away otherwise you may face many hazards likewise, it’s a OYO kind of hotel -so you can understand, they won’t have any commitment, they won’t believe in relation, they don’t understand gst or tds deduction, they don’t have basic manner how to treat client.
Even food is not hygiene- my friend fall in food poison after having food here.

F&B manager and reception manager always do bad behave and they forget everything after pay commitment and ask for extra money.

So, plz keep away from this hotel.
The food and the aesthetic vibe of the restaurant was pretty good. Mr Govind and Mr Anand were really helpful and provided us with good recommendations for the food available.

I will rate this hotel 5 out of 5 star best thing is about staff is very cooperative and helpfull and one of the best manager abhishek who helped me alot thanks to him for his best service and the food was really delicious and fresh yumm too.. I will recommend everyone to visit this hotel once it will be memorable for you.

Place was super cool with beautiful ambience and food was mouth watering.
Special thanks to Mr Govind Kumar, captain and Mr Ram Vilas, steward for their gesture and excellent customer service.
Thumbs up 👍

Very good service and staff members were so cheerful and well maintained and the food was delicious and amazing in taste overall everything was good and great and environment was clean and the food was

places_with_reviews.name: Rajhans
address: Kachari Chowk, MG Rd, Adampur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812001, India

reviews.text: Bhagalpur does not have too many options. But Hotel Rajhans International was quite a good experience. Proximity to the main road exposes the personal cars to a lot of dust, but the concierge service promptly appointed cleaners for the same. Very helpful staff gave regular reminders for morning breakfast.

I stayed here for my friends wedding and I had a great time.
Rooms are nice and spacious with ample natural light.
Ac +
Fan +
Geyser +
Storage space +
Tv +
Room service +
Electric kettle with tea/coffee sachets +
Basic toiletries provided.
Parking +
Plus it has an in-house Beauty parlour, restaurant, ice and spice, conference room, banquet hall etc.
1 minute walk to the main road.

Very poor service. They cheat you by giving full portion of food when half is available. Bathrooms are extremely filthy. Taps do not work and are jammed. The furniture in the room are all eroded. Overall very substandard place. Don’t go there.
Don't go here (saloon) Too much High charges in Men's saloon & even not giving service Good. Even in Saving blades not changed. When asked they misbehave.
V.good hotel have its own men and women hair salon and parlor,ice cream parlor,etc.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Vidya Residency Sarai Chowk Bhagalpur
address: Sarai Chowk, Golaghat, Old City, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812007, India

reviews.text:
Never been to their rooms as I am a local and have visited their restaurant only. So consider my review is for restaurant
Restaurant has two sections, one is open air section and another is covered air conditioned. Both are good place to sit and enjoy quality time with your family. Unfortunately being a roof top restaurant one can expect good views but unfortunately nothing remarkable can be seen from here.
Ambiance is good overall and service staff is attentive. Unfortunately cleaning is the section where the restaurant lacks a bit.
one of the costliest restaurants in the city, so be ready to pay big money.
Big price can be accepted if food is good. But now a day’s food is not as good as it used to be. Still one of the best food served in city.

Below is my input after staying at this property.... I hope it will help someone to decide on right hotels in Bhagalpur.

1. My booking was including Breakfast, but they deducted the amount. This was unfairly done. Commitment to customer should be on top priority.
2. They will make you wait after you checked out and paid the amount. You will not be allowed to go till they done with their investigation inside room. Look like they consider every customer as a thief or something??  This behavior is not good at all by this hotel.
3. No hot water.
4. Power outage.
5. Wifi will stop working after sometime.
6. Bathroom was not neat and clean.

Still I gave 2 star for look and feel. Apart from this I would not recommend this hotel to anyone, especially couple and family.

We stayed two nights here and the stay was comfortable. The hotel staff is superb and they went above and beyond to make us comfortable. There was an issue with hot water in the bathroom but the staff provided us with water in a bucket for shower. Overall it was a good stay and I will recommend this hotel.
It's splendid place for any type of occasion, along quality of service and delicious food. Awsome stay will be memorable. With all room amenities.

Worst hotel to stay ever! Staff is so unprofessional! There was no hot water in this hotel..I went down to complaint to reception that there is no hot water but they were not paying any attention to it.. Horrible service. Don't ever stay at this hotel.This hotel people at reception are extremely rude. Their manager Subhash kumar srivastav doesn't know how to talk to customers and he thinks and when I told him on call that there is no hot water in room he was shouting on call. Worst hotel ever . They also turn off the Lights at night. It's a request don't ever stay at this pathetic hotel.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Galaxy 16
address: Behind Hanuman Mandir, S.M. College Road Choti Khanjarpur, Chowk, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812001, India

reviews.text: The hotel is well managed and also neat and clean, elevator is also available,staff are supportive and very polite,room service is just wow,and the hotel is situated in a very good location,hotel offers you a food service also,also you can book it for family function.Overall good experience.

My experience at Hotel Galaxy 16 in Bhagalpur for the Birthday event was very disappointing. The unprofessional behavior of the hotel manager and the overall poor services were notable drawbacks. To make matters worse, several items promised in the menu, including the soup, were not provided. I recommend potential customers to explore other available options for a more satisfying dining experience.
Had a small function there.. great ambiance.. amazing service at affordable price...
Nice hotel, Spacious hotel, co-operative staffs, all facilities available here

The rooms are spacious and clean without any view as such...

The bathroom was clean but the hot water flow was very slow...

The linen were clean and AC was working fine...

They have an inhouse restaurant and the food quality is good...

They don't have any car parking attached with the hotel, its around 50 mtrs away...

Overall a good stay... recommended.
